text: Gustavo Adolfo Benjumea Jaramillo (born 12 January 1996) is a Colombian footballer who currently plays as a defender for 1º Dezembro. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Deportivo Pasto |2015 |rowspan="2"|Categoría Primera A |2||0||1Appearances in the Copa Colombia||0||0||0||3||0 |- |Rionegro Águilas |2016 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |Boyacá Chicó |2017 |Categoría Primera B |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |rowspan="3"|1º Dezembro |2017–18 |rowspan="2"|Campeonato de Portugal |23||2||1Appearances in the Taça de Portugal||0||0||0||0||0 |- |2018–19 |19||2||0||0||0||0||33||1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !42!!4!!1!!0!!0!!0!!43!!4 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !44!!4!!2!!0!!0!!0!!46!!4 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Campeonato de Portugal (league) players Category:Deportes Quindío footballers Category:Atlético Huila footballers Category:América Futebol Clube (MG) players Category:Deportivo Pasto footballers Category:Rionegro Águilas footballers Category:Boyacá Chicó F.C. footballers Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Brazil Category:Expatriate footballers in Brazil Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Sportspeople from Cali
